pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, July 11, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion at the Canadian Teachers’ Federation’s Annual General Meeting.        

Ottawa Marriott Hotel
100 Kent Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media must register with aking@ctf-fce.ca.
  • Media are asked to arrive at the Capital/Carleton room on the 2nd floor no later than 10:30 a.m.
